definition.zh_def: 動物，指所有生物界中的多細胞生物，通常具有感知能力和運動能力。
definition.en_def: A living organism that feeds on organic matter, typically having specialized sense organs and nervous system.
definition.example: The zoo has a variety of animals, including lions, elephants, and monkeys.
